title: Unknown brush font
content:
Please help identify this font. I have only 3 letters.  
I spend hours searching and the closest match was Sharik. But it is not 100% match. If anyone knows this typeface, please share the name.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113918im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6555.png)

Font: 

 Lemon 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113918/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: mikemeh

comments.content: **[Lemon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113918/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Lemon%20-%20Regular&fid=3dc9ce7276bace1c352064a624f6fb67&fsize=60&text=Tin&wrap=2)** by Eduardo Tunni [2011] part of Google Web Fonts
